title: Can we nerf garen yet?
body: Im not sure if nerfs are on the way but holy fuck. I'm so tired of having this over-tuned and NOT fun to play against champion having 9 kills and then <Removed  by Moderation> from another lane. The excuse for garen having such good numbers in his abilities was "Better players can play around him". Where is that excuse when he is the #1-2 top laner in EVERY SINGLE ELO from bronze to challenger. Why is a noobtube champion meant to introduce the player to the game the most effective laner to climb for multiple patches. Even when I played garen a couple times to test, I DEMOLISHED. 4 games of garen with 0 prior games and 4+ kda's every single game running it down top and mid lane like a monkey until we won. It wasn't even fun, it felt unfun to be so overtuned on such a simple champion.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Salvor Hardın,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RdEYy7EH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-25T11:45:25.829+0000)
>
> 53.88% in Platinum+ games........

52% plat+

49.7% diamond+

so the answer is no. he might still be popular because of his skin at the moment, but hes not op.

Hey OP, we deleted a small portion of your post for violating the Universal Rules regarding Mature Content. Please stay away from this type of language in the future!

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board
His damage is triple D size busty in the lane phase. He falls off if he isn't fed. But yeah he can be a huge nuisance to play against when he deals so much damage, and has a insta kill ult :/
